revised_title: Intuitionist Correction of the Fixed-Point Theorem on the Sphere
tldr: The author presents an intuitionist correction for the fixed-point theorem on the sphere, demonstrating the consequences of the invalidity of the Bolzano-Weierstrass theorem in intuitionism. They provide an example of a topological transformation of the sphere's surface and formulate an intuitionist theorem to replace the fixed-point theorem.
